div.p: Obviously the work I do is confidential but then you still might go home and be in a bad mood so that can ultimately have an effect on it.
On the other side of the coin if you had a really good day then, you know, you’re on cloud nine when you go home and it’s good.
I have a young child and during that process of trying to have my baby I had a few problems so I had to have quite a few operations to be able to
conceive my little girl; due to that I suppose I haven’t been able to be as proactive, you know, with activities for the young people but I’m alright now...
